name: Yellow Angel Food Cake
author: In Memory of Ella I. Schlosser
instructions: Beat yolks of eggs thick and lemon colored. Add water and beat about 4 minutes. Add flour, baking powder and salt sifted together. Beat whites stiff, adding cream of tarter. Fold whites into batter and pour in ungreased angel food pan. Bake in oven that is slow at first, 300. After 15 minutes increase heat to moderate oven, 350Â°. Then, bake for another 30 to 35 minutes.
